title: Ward skin upgraded from ward fragment won't show up in my ward selection window
body:
Title. Had a ward skin fragment, wanted to upgrade it to a permanent, so I did. But then, in champion select, when I pick which ward I want to use, the ward I should have doesn't show up. Screenshot is what I saw when i went to my recent purchases. I don't really understand why all this is happening, so if I could get it cleared up, that'd be great. 
http://i.imgur.com/MRntbTq.png
here is a screenshot of what I see when i go to my purchases.
http://i.imgur.com/f3xLTXm.png 
and here is what i see when I'm in champ select trying to pick my ward.

replies.body:
We're aware of this issue that's affecting specific ward skins from showing up in champ select, as listed on the [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). 

I don't have a timeline on when the fix will roll out, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
